text: geudeul-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeleul bunbaehandan mal-inyo hyeonse-ui saenghwalsog eseo geudeul-ege saenghwal-ui yangsig-eul bun baehaneun geos-eun hananim-isila geudeuljung-ilbuegeneun jiwileul daleun ja boda nop-i dueo geudeullo hayeogeum daleun jadeul-eul jidohadolog hayeossnola geuleonageudae junim-ui eunhyeneun geudeul-i chugjeog han jaemulboda deoug joh-eun geos-ila
